      public Client()

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

    • readMarks

      public static void readMarks​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList, int opt)
      This method is used to read the value from the student.csv file to create CourseWorkStudent or ResearchStudent object
      based on user's option

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList and an option with int value.
      Postcondition - Create either CourseWorkStudent or ResearchStudent object and store it into the ArrayList by reading
      all values from the student.csv file.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student
      opt - User's option on CourseWorkStudent or ResearchStudent

    • removeStd

      public static void removeStd​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
      This method is used to remove object from the ArrayList by enter the particular studentID

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList .
      Postcondition - The student/object successfully removed from the ArrayList if the studentID is found and
      user entered yes in the confirmation query. Else, program will ignore this transaction.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student

    • display

      public static void display​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
      This method is used to output all the detials of CourseworkStudent or ResearchStudent

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList .
      Postcondition - The program successfully display all the detials of CourseworkStudent or ResearchStudent
      including student's identification, marks, grade, etc.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student

    • getIndividualOverall

      public static double getIndividualOverall​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList, int opt, int idx)
      This method is used to to find the individual overall mark of particular student for furthur task 5 calculation

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList, option of which type of student with int value and the index of particular student.
      Postcondition - The program will calculate the student's overall mark by calling the getOverallScore() method
      and return the overall mark.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student
      opt - Option of which type of student
      idx - Index of the student/object to be dealing with
      Returns:
      overallMarks Return the overall mark of the particular student/object

    • avgOverallMark

      public static double avgOverallMark​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList, int opt)
      This method is used to to find the average overall mark of all students in the ArrayList

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList and the option of which type of student with int value.
      Postcondition - The for loop will keep calling the getIndividualOverall() method to get each individual
      overall mark and store in the running total until reach the ArrayList size. Lastly,
      return the running total.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student
      opt - Option of which type of student
      Returns:
      avgOverallMark Return the overall mark of all CourseworkStudent or ResearchStudent.

    • outputOverallAndGrade

      public static void outputOverallAndGrade​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList, int opt)
      This method is the controller of task 5.

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList and the option of which type of student with int value.
      Postcondition - The method will find and output the individual overall mark and grade of of all CourseworkStudent or ResearchStudent

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student
      opt - Option of which type of student

    • aboveOrBelowOverall

      public static void aboveOrBelowOverall​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList, int opt)
      This method is to find number of student obtained an overall mark equal/above the average overall
      mark and the number of student obtained an overall mark below the average overall mark

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList and the option of which type of student with int value.
      Postcondition - The first part of the method will get and output the total number of student,
      average overall mark and grade of all students
      Then the for loop will calculate the number of student obtained an overall mark
      equal to or above the average overall mark and how many obtained an overall mark below the
      average overall mark.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student
      opt - Option of which type of student

    • studentIDToGetDetails

      public static void studentIDToGetDetails​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
      This method is used to display the details of CourseworkStudent or ResearchStudent based on the studentID

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList.
      Postcondition - The program will prompt user to enter the studentID.
      Then the for loop will find for the same studentID object and display the details of
      the particular student by calling the writeOutput method.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student

    • studentNameToGetDetails

      public static void studentNameToGetDetails​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
      This method is used to display the details of CourseworkStudent or ResearchStudent based on student's first and last name

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList.
      Postcondition - The program will prompt user to enter the student's first name and last name.
      Then the for loop will find for the same student full name object and display the details of
      the particular student by calling the writeOutput method.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student

    • sort

      public static void sort​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
      This method is used to sort ArrayList in ascending order of the studentID by using the Bubble sort

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList.
      Postcondition - This method will sort the passed in ArrayList in ascending order of the studentID by using the Bubble sort.
      The for loop will swap the positon of the objects if the previous studentID is greater than the latter.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student

    • displaySortedArrayList

      public static void displaySortedArrayList​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList)
      This method is used to display the sorted ArrayList

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList.
      Postcondition - This method will sort the passed in ArrayList in ascending order of the studentID by
      calling the sort() method. Then display the sorted ArrayList.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student

    • storeSortedArrayList

      public static void storeSortedArrayList​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> sortedStudentList)
      This method is used to output the sorted ArrayList into the sortedArrayListOutput.csv file

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type sorted ArrayList.
      Postcondition - The sorted ArrayList will be wrote into the .csv file and can be seen in the .csv file.

      Parameters:
      sortedStudentList - An sorted ArrayList of type Student

    • menu

      public static int menu() throws java.lang.Exception
      This method is to display the menu and ask for user's choice.

      Precondition - Nil
      Postcondition - Prompt user to enter a choice and return user's choice.

      Returns:
      choice Return user's choice
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - Choice must be numeric value and between 1-10

    • process

      public static void process​(java.util.ArrayList<Student> studentList, int num)
      This method is the main controller which call and execute task according to user's choice

      Precondition - Pass in a Student type ArrayList and the option of which type of student with int value.
      Postcondition - Perform the task selected by user.

      Parameters:
      studentList - An ArrayList of type Student
      num - Option of which type of student

    • studentInfo

      public static void studentInfo()
      This method is used display the student information

      Precondition - Nil.
      Postcondition - Display student information.
